author: Bellular News
description:
Starbreeze literally told players they needed money. Then they cancelled a $27M project, laid off 44 staff, and added subscriptions to a 12-year-old game. This is what desperation looks like. But it may be their only way to save the company.

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!

00:00 Dude, We Need The Money!
01:05 The State Of Payday
02:49 Subscription Model
05:10 Secret Price Hike
07:42 The (Payday) Brand Is The Future
12:01 Running Multiple Games As A Service

Sources:

title: When Payday Devs Said “Dude, We Need The Money”, They Meant It
